vote.text: Amendment SA 1580 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1580 proposed by Senator Daines for Senator McCaskill. (consideration: CR S7067-7068; text: CR S7067-7068) To improve the bill.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1580 proposed by Senator Daines for Senator McCaskill.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1580 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
